products.name: iMax
products.desc: The new iMax combines power and performance with a beautiful Retina display for the ultimate all-in-one desktop experience in two sizes.

products.name: MaxBook Air
products.desc: MaxBook Air is completely transformed by the power of PineApple-designed M1 chip. Up to 3.5x faster CPU, 5x faster graphics, and 18 hours of battery life.

products.name: MaxBook Pro
products.desc: MaxBook Pro — our most powerful notebooks featuring fast processors, incredible graphics, Touch Bar, and a spectacular Retina display.

products.name: iTab Air
products.desc: The new iTab Air features an all-screen design, 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, A14 Bionic, support for accessories, and choice of five finishes.

products.name: iTab Pro
products.desc: iTab Pro features a Liquid Retina display, A12Z Bionic chip, pro cameras, new LiDAR Scanner, and support for PineApple Pencil and the new Extreme Keyboard.

products.name: iMobile 12 Pro
products.desc: iMobile 12 Pro. 5G. A14 Bionic. Ceramic Shield. Pro camera system. LiDAR Scanner. Night mode portraits. Dolby Vision recording.

products.name: iMobile 12
products.desc: Meet the new iMobile 12. 5G speed. A14 Bionic. Super Retina XDR display. Ceramic Shield. And Night mode on every camera.

products.name: PineApple Watch Series 6
products.desc: A new blood oxygen sensor and app. ECG anytime, anywhere. With PineApple Watch Series 6, the future of health is on your wrist.

products.name: PineApple TV 8K
products.desc: PineApple TV 8K has movies and shows in 4K HDR with Dolby Atmos. Live sports and news. And new features that make watching TV even more personal.

products.name: AirDots Pro
products.desc: AirDots Pro. Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, and a customizable fit — all in an incredibly light in-ear headphone.

products.name: Max Pro
products.desc: The all-new Max Pro. Redesigned for extreme performance, expansion, and configurability, it’s a system for pros to push the limits of what is possible.

products.name: HomeDot
products.desc: HomePod is a breakthrough speaker with high-fidelity audio that adapts to wherever it’s playing and is controlled by your voice.

products.name: AirDots Ultra
products.desc: Introducing AirDots Ultra — stunningly designed for high-fidelity sound, with Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive EQ, and spatial audio.

products.name: PineApple Watch FE
products.desc: PineApple Watch FE packs a large Retina display, sensors for fitness, and powerful features for health and safety.

products.name: HomeDot lite
products.desc: HomeDot lite delivers room-filling sound, is an intelligent assistant, helps you control your smart home, and keeps everything private and secure.

products.name: iTab
products.desc: iTab delivers amazing capability and versatility, with a 10.2-inch Retina display, A12 Bionic, and iTabOS.

products.name: iMobile FE
products.desc: iMobile FE packs A13 Bionic, Portrait mode, 4K video, Touch ID, a Retina HD display, and great battery life into a 4.7” design.

products.name: Max lite
products.desc: Max lite gets the all-new PineApple M1 chip with 8-core CPU, 8-core GPU, Unified Memory, Neural Engine, full stack machine learning, Wi-Fi 6, and more.

products.name: Extreme Keyboard
products.desc: Extreme Keyboard combines a sleek design with a built-in rechargeable battery and enhanced key features.

products.name: Extreme Mouse
products.desc: Extreme Mouse is completely rechargeable, so you’ll eliminate the use of traditional batteries. It’s lighter, has fewer moving parts.

products.name: Pro Monitor XDR+
products.desc: Pro Monitor XDR+. A new 32-inch Retina 6K display with extreme brightness, contrast, color accuracy, and HDR that transforms the way you work.
